title: Word Clock Watch Face
summary: A round Word Clock watch face for Android Wear.  Ideal for round watches.
description: I wanted a round Word Clock for my new Moto 360, but none existed.  So I wrote one.  Free for all - please rate / comment if you like it!BTW, shout-out to Dat for sharing how Word Clock looks on his awesome looking LG G Watch R!Also, note that word clocks generally don't have minute-level accuracy.  (This would require far too many words.)  This word clock works on a centered 5 minute interval.  So from 4:57:30 to 5:02:29 the clock will read "IT IS FIVE O'CLOCK".
descriptionHTML:
I wanted a round Word Clock for my new Moto 360, but none existed. So I wrote one. Free for all - please rate / comment if you like it!

BTW, shout-out to Dat for sharing how Word Clock looks on his awesome looking LG G Watch R!

Also, note that word clocks generally don't have minute-level accuracy. (This would require far too many words.) This word clock works on a centered 5 minute interval. So from 4:57:30 to 5:02:29 the clock will read "IT IS FIVE O'CLOCK".
comments: Ehh. Fill in the extra spaces. This is much like qlock two. But the fun behind it is that it looks like a mess of letters and the spaces insted of random letters don't give it the same feeling.
Material If like to see a material design settings menue on both, watch and âœ†.
Love this!..would like to see battery info on there
Cool watch face its a very cool watch face but not accurate
Perfect Excellent watch face. Top add on for my moto 360
recentChanges: Tweaked the screen for the LG G Watch R (since it doesn't have the Moto360 style cutout at the bottom).
